fields.text: Thank you for calling Grin, Sacramento’s all-in-one influencer marketing platform to find, recruit, and activate top social influencers.
Press [INDEX] to speak with our sales team about a demo or pricing.
Press [INDEX] to schedule a free live demo of Grin’s software.
Please hold while we connect you to our demo scheduling team.
Press [INDEX] to discuss pricing options and subscription plans.
Please hold while we connect you to a pricing specialist.
Press [INDEX] for customer support and account assistance.
Press [INDEX] for technical support with your Grin software.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.
Press [INDEX] for billing questions or account updates.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.
